messages.subject: Nihonto Sales Board Updated

messages.messageBody:
All, 3 new tsuba and 3 set's of Menuki have been added to the sales
board. Be sure to take a look. some of our members are now putting up
their items and we have some nicely priced fittings up there for sale.

Cheers

Rich Turner

http://members.westnet.com.au/whiz/richard/sale/nihonto_sales_page.htm

--
Richard Turner
Nihontô Message Board <http://members5.boardhost.com/Nihon-To/>

/- for the discussion and sharing of all things Nihontô/
